name: Food Escaper
description:
Hide-and-seek between food and cooks.
The players are divided into two groups: those who search and those who hide, and hide in the kitchen, under desks, and on the walls.
Many stages are available.
And most importantly, you have to push the person who is the seeker.
The idea is to push others who are within the seeker's field of vision. But try to be kind.

Features：
ㆍUnique 3D visuals
ㆍ Can be played by both Seekers and Hiders
ㆍFlexible and free to play
ㆍHigh quality
ㆍAddictive, fun and relaxing
